tasks.label: Run Jekyll Server
tasks.command: export PATH="$HOME/.rbenv/bin:$PATH" && eval "$(rbenv init -)" && bundle exec jekyll serve --livereload
tasks.detail: Jekyll 서버를 실행하고 라이브 리로드를 활성화합니다.

tasks.label: Build Jekyll Site
tasks.command: export PATH="$HOME/.rbenv/bin:$PATH" && eval "$(rbenv init -)" && bundle exec jekyll build
